atg.commerce.order.processor
Class ValidatePaymentGroupPipelineArgs

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap
      java.util.HashMap
          atg.commerce.order.processor.ValidationPipelineArgs
              atg.commerce.order.processor.ValidatePaymentGroupPipelineArgs
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map, java.io.Serializable
public class ValidatePaymentGroupPipelineArgs
extends ValidationPipelineArgs

ValidatPaymentGroupPipelineArgs provides a dictionary for storing arguments to the pipeline processors that validate payment groups, and includes convenience methods for looking up well-known names within that dictionary.

See Also:
